00076     public static function generate( $iLength = 20, $eType = self::ALL )
00077     {
00078         if ( ! isset( self::$m_arSeed ) || ! is_array( self::$m_arSeed[ $eType ] ) ) return md5( time() . time() );
00079 
00080         $_sHash = null;
00081         $_iSize = count( self::$m_arSeed[ $eType ] ) - 1;
00082         for ( $_i = 0; $_i < $iLength; $_i++ ) $_sHash .= self::$m_arSeed[ $eType ][ mt_rand( 0, $_iSize ) ];
00083 
00084         return $_sHash;
00085     }
00086     
00096     public static function hash( $sValueToHash = null, $eHashType = self::SHA1, $iLength = 32, $bRawOutput = false )
00097     {
00098         $_sValue = ( null === $sValueToHash ) ? self::generate( $iLength ) : $sValueToHash;
00099         
00100         switch ( $eHashType )
00101         {
00102             case self::MD5:
00103                 $_sHash = md5( $_sValue, $bRawOutput );
00104                 break;
00105                 
00106             case self::SHA1:
00107                 $_sHash = sha1( $_sValue, $bRawOutput );
00108                 break;
00109                 
00110             case self::CRC32:
00111                 $_sHash = crc32( $_sValue );
00112                 break;
00113 
00114             default:
00115                 $_sHash = hash( $eHashType, $_sValue, $bRawOutput );
00116                 break;
00117         }
00118         
00119         return $_sHash;
00120     }
